metadata.name: KURAI MIZU PARADISE
metadata.description:
WELCOME TO THE PRISTINE COASTS OF KURAI MIZU. One of Paradise's premiere destination always calling for those looking to explore beyond the simple confines of land.  As a new dawn rises, so do the inhabitants blessed to visit and live in such ethereal lands. Migrations in this region are often conducted by sea, though in the last century members of the Kurai Hikari Ops have pioneered a new sacred practice of travel by air.

Digital Illustration, Handdrawn
2022

KURAI MIZU PARADISE
SHADE 001
